short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT-Refinery gas analyzer system
description: THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT #
full_summary:
[Notice of Proposed Procurement][1]
=====================================

**Reference Number:** CB-646-44657796
**Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000085211

**Request for Proposal (RFP):** `(Published on Nov 18, 2024)` 
September’s proposal submissions will be accepted until 2 PM (EDT) on December 18, 2024.

**Acquisition Eligibility:**

This procurement opportunity is restricted to holders of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI under category Gas Chromatographs. Only those Suppliers pre-qualified on this Supply Arrangement will be invited to submit a proposal.

**Scope of Services:**

Natural Resources Canada seeks to acquire one (1) Refinery gas analyzer system for laboratory use.

**Incumbent Contact:**

Vincent Gariépy
[Email vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
Phone: (819) 239-9895

**Support Documentation:**

Visit [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) to view the official request for proposal notice.

**Procedure deadlines:**

Open Date: November 18, 2024
Close Date: December 18, 2024 14:00:00

Please approach Can RS084Wy securely for detailed repository list from website.

Regards,

 Vincent Gariépy
